content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position unknown) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### Pipe system at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Belt system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before use.
- Ensure that burner entities are connected to a power source.

### Errors when using inserter entities
- Ensure that inserter entities have source items before use.

### Errors when using furnace entities
- Ensure that furnace entities have ingredients before use.

### Errors when using steam engine entities
- Ensure that steam engine entities are connected to a power network.

### Errors when using electricity group entities
- Ensure that electricity group entities are plugged into an electric network.

### Errors when using pipe group entities
- Ensure that pipe group entities are not empty before use.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No variables have been assigned.
